data.text: Nomuli, gei au gaa mmada gi Tama siibi e huge tahi noo i nia noo e hidu aalaa, gei au ga longono di manu e dahi i nia manu mouli e haa, e helekai be di lee atili, “Hanimoi!”

Au gaa mmada, ga gidee di hoodo kene. Tangada dela i hongo di maa le e daahi dana maalei, gei mee gaa wanga ginai di hau king. Mee gaa hana be taane maaloo hai heebagi belee haga magedaa ono hagadaumee.6.2 Zechariah 1.8; 6.3,6
Nomuli, gei Tama siibi gaa huge di lua noo, gei au ga longono di lua manu mouli e helekai, “Hanimoi!”

Di hoodo labelaa ga hanimoi, di hoodo mmee. Tangada dela i hongo di hoodo deelaa, la guu wanga ginai di mogobuna e daamada dana dauwa i henuailala, e hai nia daangada gi hagadau dadaaligi ginaadou. Mee guu wanga labelaa ginai tulumanu dauwa damana.6.4 Zechariah 1.8; 6.2

Nomuli, gei Tama siibi gaa huge di tolu noo, gei au ga longono di tolu manu mouli e helekai, “Hanimoi!” Au gaa mmada, ga gidee di hoodo luuli. Tangada dela i hongo di maa, e daahi di mee pauna mee i lodo dono lima.6.5 Zechariah 6.2,6

Au ga longono di mee e hai be di lee e hanimoi i mehanga nia manu mouli e haa, e helekai, “Nia pauna palaawaa ‘wheat’ e lua, dela di hui ngalua di laangi e dahi, gei nia pauna palaawaa ‘barley’ e ono, dela di hui ngalua di laangi e dahi. Hudee hunahuna ina nia laagau olib mo nia hadagee waini!”Nia laagau ‘barley’
Nomuli, gei Tama siibi gaa huge di haa noo, gei au ga longono di haa manu mouli e helekai, “Hanimoi!”

Au gaa mmada, ga gidee di hoodo gono kene. Tangada dela i hongo di maa, le e haga ingoo bolo “Made”. Gei di “Heidis”,6.8 Heidis: di gowaa digau mmade e daudali a mee. Meemaa guu wanga ginai di mogobuna e daaligi dahi baahi e haa o henuailala, e daaligi gi tauwa, tau magamaga, nia magi, mo nia manu lodo geinga.6.8 Ezekiel 14.21

Nomuli, gei Tama siibi gaa huge di lima noo, gei au gaa mmada gi lala di gowaa hai tigidaumaha gi nia hagataalunga o digau ala ne daaligi. Digaula ne daaligi, idimaa, digaula nogo hagadele nnelekai a God, gei nogo manawa dahi ang gi nadau haga modongoohia nnelekai a God.
Digaula gaa wwolo gi nua, ga heeu, “Tagi Maaloo dangihi, e haga madagu gei e donu! E waalooloo behee i mua dau hagi aga nia daangada i henuailala, ga hagaduadua digau ala ne daaligi gimaadou?”

Digaula huogodoo gaa wanga ginai nia gahu lloo kene dagidahi, ga helekai ginai bolo gi taalia maalia, gaa dae loo gi di hulu dogologo o nadau ihoo hai hegau mo nadau ihoo dama Christ guu dohu gu dogomaalia di daaligi be di nadau hai nogo hai.

Gei au gaa mmada gi Tama siibi e huge di ono noo. Gei tenua gu ngalungalua damana, gei di laa ga bouli dongoeho gadoo be di gahu luuli, gei di malama gaa mmee hagatau be nia dodo.6.12 Hagagida 11.13; 16.18; Isaiah 13.10; Joel 2.10,31; 3.15; Matthew 24.29; Mark 13.24-25; Luke 21.25
Nia heduu ga too ia gi henuailala, gadoo be nia golee modo o di laagau ‘fig’ ne lulu go di madangi maaloo.6.13 Isaiah 34.4
Di langi ga hagalee gadoo be di lau beebaa ne wini, gei nia gonduu mo nia henua huogodoo ga haga mmaanege gi daha mo nadau lohongo.6.14 Hagagida 16.20

Nia king o henuailala, nia dagi, nia dagi dauwa aamua, digau maluagina, digau mogobuna ge aamua, mo nia daangada huogodoo ala i golo, nia hege mo digau moholo ang gi ginaadou, gaa pala hagammuni i lodo nia lua mo i lala nia hadugalaa o nia gonduu.6.15 Isaiah 2.19,21

Digaula gaa wwolo gi nia gonduu mo nia hadugalaa, “Too ia gi madau nua, e hagammuni gimaadou i nia golomada Tangada dela e noho i hongo di lohongo king, mo i di hagawelewele o Tama siibi!6.16 Hosea 10.8; Luke 23.30
Di laangi hagamadagudagu dangada o nau hagawelewele la gu dau mai, koai dela e mee di duu aga e hai baahi gi di maa?”6.17 Joel 2.11; Malachi 3.2
